amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Energy to transmit to Congress a plan for the transfer of title to the Western New York Service Center in West Valley, New York.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1393 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1393 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9941-9942; text: CR S9941) To require the Secretary of Energy to transmit to Congress a plan for the transfer of title to the Western New York Service Center in West Valley, New York.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1393 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1393 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Schumer.
